WITH DW AS (SELECT W.WORK_NAME AS WORK_NAME , ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM , W.WORK_NO AS WORK_NO , W.STATUS AS STATUS , W.PROJECT_NO AS PROJECT_NO , W.BEGIN_DATE AS BEGIN_DATE , W.COMPLETE_DATE AS COMPLETE_DATE , W.PRECEDE_NO AS PRECEDE_NO , W.COMPLETE_RATE AS COMPLETE_RATE , W.WORK_LEVEL AS WORK_LEVEL , W.HIGH_WORK_NO AS HIGH_WORK_NO , W2.WORK_NAME AS HIGH_WORK_NAME , W.WORK_TYPE AS WORK_TYPE , W.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO , W.WORK_STATUS AS WORK_STATUS , M.MEMBER_NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_TYPE AS MEMBER_TYPE , (W.COMPLETE_DATE - W.BEGIN_DATE) AS DAYS FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON W.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN WORK W2 ON W.HIGH_WORK_NO = W2.WORK_NO WHERE W.PROJECT_NO = #{value} AND W.WORK_TYPE = '프로젝트' AND W.WORK_STATUS = 'Y' START WITH W.HIGH_WORK_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR W.WORK_NO = W.HIGH_WORK_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY W.BEGIN_DATE) SELECT W.WORK_NAME AS WORK_NAME , ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM , (SELECT ROW_NUM FROM DW WHERE DW.WORK_NO = W.HIGH_WORK_NO) AS HIGH_WORK_NUM , W.WORK_NO AS WORK_NO , W.STATUS AS STATUS , W.PROJECT_NO AS PROJECT_NO , W.BEGIN_DATE AS BEGIN_DATE , W.COMPLETE_DATE AS COMPLETE_DATE , W.PRECEDE_NO AS PRECEDE_NO , W.COMPLETE_RATE AS COMPLETE_RATE , W.WORK_LEVEL AS WORK_LEVEL , W.HIGH_WORK_NO AS HIGH_WORK_NO , W2.WORK_NAME AS HIGH_WORK_NAME , W.WORK_TYPE AS WORK_TYPE , W.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO , W.WORK_STATUS AS WORK_STATUS , M.MEMBER_NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_TYPE AS MEMBER_TYPE , (W.COMPLETE_DATE - W.BEGIN_DATE) AS DAYS FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON W.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN WORK W2 ON W.HIGH_WORK_NO = W2.WORK_NO WHERE W.PROJECT_NO = #{value} AND W.WORK_TYPE = '프로젝트' AND W.WORK_STATUS = 'Y' START WITH W.HIGH_WORK_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR W.WORK_NO = W.HIGH_WORK_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY W.BEGIN_DATE

SELECT W.WORK_NO AS WORK_NO, W.WORK_NAME AS WORK_NAME, W.STATUS AS STATUS, W.PROJECT_NO AS PROJECT_NO, W.BEGIN_DATE AS BEGIN_DATE, W.COMPLETE_DATE AS COMPLETE_DATE, W.PRECEDE_NO AS PRECEDE_NO, W.COMPLETE_RATE AS COMPLETE_RATE, W.WORK_LEVEL AS WORK_LEVEL, W.HIGH_WORK_NO AS HIGH_WORK_NO, W.WORK_TYPE AS WORK_TYPE, W.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO, W.WORK_STATUS AS WORK_STATUS, M.MEMBER_NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TYPE AS MEMBER_TYPE, (COMPLETE_DATE - BEGIN_DATE) AS DAYS FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON W.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{pid} AND WORK_TYPE = '프로젝트' AND WORK_STATUS = 'Y' AND WORK_LEVEL = '1' and WORK_NO != #{workNo} ORDER BY BEGIN_DATE

SELECT T.TEAM_PK , PROJECT_PK , MEMBER_PK , ROLE , MEMBER_NAME , DEPT_NAME , RANK_NAME , DEPT_NO , EMAIL FROM PROJECT_TEAM T JOIN (SELECT M.MEMBER_NO , M.MEMBER_ID , M.PASSWORD , M.MEMBER_NAME , M.PHONE , M.EMAIL , M.MEMBER_TYPE , M.RANK_NO , M.DEPT_NO , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , m.STATUS , DEPT_NAME , HIGH_DEPT , DEPT_LEVEL , RANK_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPT D ON M.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO JOIN RANK R2 ON M.RANK_NO = R2.RANK_NO) M ON T.MEMBER_PK = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE PROJECT_PK = #{value}

SELECT WP.PRODUCT_NO , WP.WORK_NO , A.AT_NO , A.DIVISION , A.ORIGIN_NAME , A.EXT , A.FILEPATH , P.PROJECT_PK , P.PROJECT_NAME , W.WORK_NAME , WP.PRODUCT_TYPE , WP.PRODUCT_TITLE , M.MEMBER_NAME , WP.ENROLL_DATE , WP.MODIFY_DATE FROM WORK_PRODUCT WP JOIN WORK W ON WP.WORK_NO = W.WORK_NO JOIN PROJECT P ON W.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK JOIN MEMBER M ON W.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.DIVISION = WP.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PROJECT_PK = #{value} AND W.STATUS = 'Y' AND WP.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.STATUS = 'Y'

-- 프로젝트별 산출물 수 WITH SANCHUL AS (SELECT COUNT(PROJECT_NO) AS COUNT, PROJECT_NO FROM WORK_PRODUCT WP JOIN WORK W ON WP.WORK_NO = W.WORK_NO GROUP BY PROJECT_NO), -- 프로젝트별 이슈 수 ISSUE_COUNT AS (SELECT COUNT(PROJECT_NO) AS COUNT, PROJECT_NO FROM ISSUE GROUP BY PROJECT_NO) SELECT P.PROJECT_PK AS PROJECT_PK , P.PROJECT_NAME AS PROJECT_NAME , P.IS_IMPORTANT AS IS_IMPORTANT , P.PROJECT_TYPE_PK AS PROJECT_TYPE_PK , PT.TYPE_NAME AS TYPE_NAME , P.PROJECT_RANK AS PROJECT_RANK , P.PROJECT_MANAGER AS PROJECT_MANAGER , T.MEMBER_PK AS MEMBER_PK , T.MEMBER_NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , P.PROJECT_TYPE_PK AS PROJECT_TYPE_PK , P.DEPT_NO AS DEPT_NO , D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_NAME , P.START_DATE AS START_DATE , P.END_DATE AS END_DATE , P.STATUS AS STATUS -- , T.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID , CASE WHEN S.COUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE S.COUNT END AS PRODUCT_COUNT , CASE WHEN I.COUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE I.COUNT END AS ISSUE_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WORK WHERE PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK AND STATUS = 'PL승인완료' AND WORK_TYPE = '프로젝트') AS WORK_CLEAR , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WORK WHERE PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK AND WORK_TYPE = '프로젝트') AS ALL_WORK FROM PROJECT P JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO JOIN PROJECT_TYPE PT ON P.PROJECT_TYPE_PK = PT.TYPE_PK JOIN (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_TEAM JOIN MEMBER M ON PROJECT_TEAM.MEMBER_PK = M.MEMBER_NO) T ON P.PROJECT_PK = T.PROJECT_PK LEFT OUTER JOIN SANCHUL S ON S.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK LEFT OUTER JOIN ISSUE_COUNT I ON I.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK WHERE T.MEMBER_PK = #{memberNo} and P.STATUS != '5' ORDER BY START_DATE

-- 프로젝트별 산출물 수 WITH SANCHUL AS (SELECT COUNT(PROJECT_NO) AS COUNT, PROJECT_NO FROM WORK_PRODUCT WP JOIN WORK W ON WP.WORK_NO = W.WORK_NO GROUP BY PROJECT_NO), -- 프로젝트별 이슈 수 ISSUE_COUNT AS (SELECT COUNT(PROJECT_NO) AS COUNT, PROJECT_NO FROM ISSUE GROUP BY PROJECT_NO) SELECT count(*) FROM PROJECT P JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO JOIN PROJECT_TYPE PT ON P.PROJECT_TYPE_PK = PT.TYPE_PK JOIN (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_TEAM JOIN MEMBER M ON PROJECT_TEAM.MEMBER_PK = M.MEMBER_NO) T ON P.PROJECT_PK = T.PROJECT_PK LEFT OUTER JOIN SANCHUL S ON S.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK LEFT OUTER JOIN ISSUE_COUNT I ON I.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_PK WHERE T.MEMBER_PK = #{memberNo} and P.STATUS != '5'
